loan.use: to cultivate 3 1/2 acres of corn and 1 3/4 acres of beans.
loan.description:
Elizabeth is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to cultivating basic grains. She can count on experience in this activity, and she is the only woman belonging to the group.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan to purchase sufficient seeds, manure, and fertilizers to cultivate 3 1/2 acres of corn and 1 3/4 acres of beans. The well-being of her 2 children, who both attend school, depends upon this activity.

She can count on her husband's help in cultivating her basic grains.

With the earnings Elizabeth obtains, she hopes to continue helping her family.
loan.whySpecial: It empowers farmers to diversify, and thus stabilize, their families' sources of income.
